A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie was tremendously painful to view.

I wish Disney would have hired a talented director that took the responsibility of making a movie that moves the Star Wars universe in a direction\, any direction would have been nice.

Story was a heaping mess. boring and flat.

The plot was a lazy mast of parts jammed together with other parts that didn't fit\, with duct tape holding it all together\, leaving huge uneven gaps.

Seems like no research was completed for character referencing which made the actors on screen appear flat\, paper thin and strangers to their own bodies.

When the story did show up\, it squandered a lot of good solid opportunities as it laid waste to any exciting history that the past had to offer.

All in all\, leaves to wonder if the guy that fell asleep behind me in the movie theater was right for doing so.
